querys.query: SELECT * FROM member WHERE company_id = :companyId AND auth_level > 2 AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'name' THEN name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'loginName' THEN login_name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'all' THEN name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR login_name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT :limit, :pageSize

SELECT COUNT(1) as total_count FROM member WHERE company_id = :companyId AND auth_level > 2 AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'name' THEN name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'loginName' THEN login_name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'all' THEN name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR login_name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END )
SELECT * FROM member WHERE company_id = :companyId AND auth_level > 2
SELECT * FROM member WHERE company_id = :companyId AND auth_level > 0 AND auth_level < 5

SELECT c.name AS company_name, c.use_config_json AS company_use_config_json, m.* FROM member m INNER JOIN company c ON m.company_id = c.id WHERE m.company_id = :companyId AND m.login_name = :loginName
UPDATE member SET auth_level = IFNULL(:authLevel, auth_level), state = IFNULL(:state, state), profile_image_id = IFNULL(:profileImageId, profile_image_id), update_member_id = :loginId WHERE id = :id
UPDATE member SET state = :state, update_member_id = :loginId WHERE id = :id
UPDATE member SET state = :state, auth_level = :authLevel, update_member_id = :loginId WHERE id = :id
SELECT c.name AS company_name, c.use_config_json AS company_use_config_json, m.* FROM member m INNER JOIN company c ON m.company_id = c.id WHERE m.id = :id
